Spiking neural network conversion toolbox¶

The SNN conversion toolbox contains functions to transform rate-based artificial neural networks into spiking neural networks, and to simulate them. The source code can be found on GitHub. See also the accompanying article.

User Guide¶

These sections guide you through the installation, configuration and running of the toolbox. Examples are included.

  • Spiking neural network conversion toolbox

  • Configuration
